post:
MVPS LTD, a European web hosting company proudly announces our VPS hosting offers at https://www.mvps.net

Our VPS services start at 3 EUR (vat exclusive) and offer:
- Almost instant delivery
- DDoS protection
- Multiple Operating Systems
- Free Automated Backups
- 1Gbps Shared Network
- SSD only storage
- Multiple locations
- VPS cloning
- Automated VPS upgrades
- 7 days a week support

We currently offer the following locations:
- France VPS
- Germany VPS

Our 4 main packages are:

VPS One
1 CPU Core
2 GB RAM
25 GB SSD DISK
3TB Bandwidth at 1Gbps Shared
1 IP
Price: 3 EUR
Order VPS One


VPS Basic
2 CPU Core
4 GB RAM
50 GB SSD DISK
7TB Bandwidth at 1Gbps Shared
1 IP
Price: 7 EUR
Order VPS Basic


VPS Power
4 CPU Core
8 GB RAM
100 GB SSD DISK
20TB Bandwidth at 1Gbps Shared
2 IP
Price: 19 EUR
Order VPS Power

VPS Ultra
8 CPU Core
32 GB RAM
200 GB SSD DISK
40TB Bandwidth at 1Gbps Shared
4 IP
Price: 49 EUR
Order VPS Ultra

You can freely upgrade your VPS instantly via our self-service platform.
All the prices are VAT-exclusive.

We have a 3 days full refund policy for the first service bought.

We accept PayPal, Credit Cards, Different Bank Transfers, Web Money, BitCoin and various cryptocurrencies.

https://www.mvps.net
